RecoverPwd.Info_part_II: We'll send a confirmation email with a link to generate a new password.

Withdrawal.Title: Withdrawal
Withdrawal.AmountExceed: Withdrawal amount cannot be greater than available value

Support.message: Nous voulons répondre à vos meilleures attentes. Contactez-nous via l'un des canaux ci-dessous.

Home.Account_not_safe: ATTENTION! Your account is not 100% safe!
Home.Ensure_safety: To ensure your account safety and to allow a recovery if necessary, you must setup the Two Factor Authentication.
Home.Important: IMPORTANT: Without this procedure, we will not be able to recover your account if it gets stolen
Home.Almost_there: Almost there! You need another directly sponsored member on the other leg! He must be active with at least one approved TRADER 2 pack or above.
Home.To_be_qualified: To be qualified, you need two directly sponsored member, one in the LEFT leg and the other in the RIGHT. Both must be active with at least one approved TRADER 2 pack or above.
Home.Lower_payment: The system has identified a payment lower than the order value. To complete your payment, please send the value of

Orders.AddressUnique: - The address above is unique and exclusive for this payment. If you don't pay the order in 30 minutes, the address above is deleted and you need to create a new order.
Orders.AmountSent: - The amount to be sent should be exactly
Orders.ValuesBelow: Values below this amount will not enable this pack. Values above this value will not be returned.

UserProfile.Title: My Account
UserProfile.TheMessage: the message of Zyoucoin with the title 'Zyoucoin Password Recovery'
UserProfile.FillUsername: Enter your username to send a confirmation email to generate a new login password
UserProfile.2step_token_placeholder: Type your Two Step Verification token here (6 digits)
UserProfile.2stepauth_info: Two-step verification, often referred to as Two-factor authentication (2FA), is a security process in which the user provides two authentication factors to verify they are who they say they are, thus providing an additional layer of security. You sign in with something you know (your password) and something you have (a code generated by your phone).
UserProfile.smartphone: To use two-step verification you must have an specific app on your smartphone:
UserProfile.configure_date: Before you proceed, configure your smartphone to get date, time and time zone automatically. The Authenticator will not work without this automatic setting.
UserProfile.How_to_2: 1. Scan the code below on your app or enter the key manually;
UserProfile.How_to_3: 2. Type the 6-digit code generated by your app on Token box below;
UserProfile.Problem: Problem reading the code? Type this key on the app:
UserProfile.2StepEnterCode: Enter your 2-Step Authentication Token (6 digit code from Google Authenticator)
UserProfile.2StepEnableInfo: Problem read the code? Type this key on the app: 2AGMBKZMASQSYBAS
UserProfile.2StepEnableDetail:
• Scan the code below on your app or enter the key manually;
  • Type the 6-digit code generated by your app on Token box below;
  • Click on Enable 2-Step button.
UserProfile.2StepHelp: Enter the 2-step verification created by your authentication platform
UserProfile.2StepImportantDetail: To use two-step verification you must have an specific app on your smartphone such as Google Authenticator, click here for install; Before you proceed, configure your smartphone to get date, time and time zone automatically. If you won't do that, it's not gonna work.
UserProfile.two_fa_enabled: Your account is not protected! Please setup your 2-Step Authentication in "My Account"

Msg20170711.Title: Dear Affiliate
Msg20170711.Line1: The value of the No Limits course has been deducted from your bonus today. You can access the course through this link:
Msg20170711.Line2: To validate your account use this key in your signup:
Msg20170711.Line3: Another update in our system is that starting today, all bonuses you received count towards doubling your package. This will give even more sustainability and longevity to our business that has grown a lot since it was launched. In case you already doubled your package value, buy a new one to continue earning more bonus.

MsgRenew.Title: All your packages doubled
MsgRenew.Line1: Congratulations! All your packages have doubled! To continue earning bonus, please renew your pack now:
MsgRenew.Pack: Congratulations! Your package has doubled in value! To win more bonuses, renew your package now:
